markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cut the Bonds](/Feats.aspx?ID=934) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Bellflower Tiller](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=23)

**Prerequisites**
[Bellflower Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=928); expert in a melee weapon

</column>

---

Select a magical effect that has made an adjacent member of your crop clumsy, grabbed, paralyzed, restrained, or slowed. Attempt a counteract check using your attack modifier (including your multiple attack penalty) with a melee weapon with which you have expert proficiency. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up. On a success, you free that member from the effect; on a failure, you can’t attempt to use Cut the Bonds on that effect on that crop member until 24 hours have passed.
name: Cut the Bonds
prerequisite: Bellflower Dedication; expert in a melee weapon
prerequisite_markdown: [Bellflower Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=928); expert in a melee weapon

<summary>
You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.
</summary>
summary: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.
summary_markdown: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.
